review: Streams quite well from my Android phone but poorly from my new laptop.  Does not stream video as well out of chrome browser as I thought it would.  Also is very slow and quite poor for streaming a chrome tab for showing websites.  No Google Picasa integration yet either for easy photo sharing.  All in all, if you have a mobile phone you want to stream YouTube videos from, this works surprisingly well.  Beyond that, I'm not all that impressed.
